mention.text: Judge Clarence Thomas moving statement at Kennebunkport last week

us of this simple truth -- It was once thought that to choose a conservative black for a high appointment put liberals in an uncomfortable position , but we will learn in the Thomas hearings that this is no longer so Not that the hearings will be color blind , color blind 's just that senators are going to use Mr. Thomas 's race to prove things about that senators with color blind Senators of the left will use Judge Clarence Thomas to prove Senators of the left are not minority-whipped Senators of the left will demonstrate through measured abuse that Senators of the left are able to treat a black man as Senators of the left equal Their ferocity , Senators of the left will think , is proof of their sophistication , a compliment
Senators of the left equal Their ferocity , Senators of the left

the uncoerced , unforced affirmative action that Americans tend to take when someone at a disadvantage -- race , physical disability -- needs help When Mr. Thomas made Judge Clarence Thomas moving statement at Kennebunkport last week Judge Clarence Thomas thanked the people who had helped him along the way , including the nuns who taught him -LRB- What a touching and old-fashioned thing to do If Sandra Day O'Connor had thanked the nuns it would have been a skit on '' Saturday Night Live '' and an issue in Sandra Day O'Connor confirmation
someone at a disadvantage -- race , physical disability --
